org.opends.server.backends.jeb

Class JECompressedSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.CompressedSchema
      • org.opends.server.backends.jeb.JECompressedSchema

  • public final class JECompressedSchema
extends CompressedSchema
    This class provides a compressed schema implementation whose definitions are stored in a Berkeley DB JE database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JECompressedSchema(com.sleepycat.je.Environment environment)
      Creates a new instance of this JE compressed schema manager.

      Closes the databases and releases any resources held by this compressed schema manager.

      Persists the provided encoded attribute.
      protected void storeObjectClasses(byte[] encodedObjectClasses, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> objectClassNames)
      Persists the provided encoded object classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JECompressedSchema

        public JECompressedSchema(com.sleepycat.je.Environment environment)
                   throws com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseException,
                          InitializationException
        Creates a new instance of this JE compressed schema manager.
        Parameters:
        environment - A reference to the database environment in which the databases will be held.
        Throws:
        com.sleepycat.je.DatabaseException - If a database problem occurs while loading the compressed schema definitions from the database.
        InitializationException - If an error occurs while loading and processing the compressed schema definitions.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the databases and releases any resources held by this compressed schema manager.

      • storeAttribute

        protected void storeAttribute(byte[] encodedAttribute,
                  java.lang.String attributeName,
                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> attributeOptions)
                       throws DirectoryException
        Persists the provided encoded attribute. The default implementation is to do nothing. Calls to this method are synchronized, so implementations can assume that this method is not being called by other threads. Note that this method is not thread-safe with respect to CompressedSchema.storeObjectClasses(byte[], Collection).
        Overrides:
        storeAttribute in class CompressedSchema
        Parameters:
        encodedAttribute - The encoded attribute description.
        attributeName - The user provided attribute type name.
        attributeOptions - The non-null but possibly empty set of attribute options.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If an error occurred while persisting the encoded attribute.

      • storeObjectClasses

        protected void storeObjectClasses(byte[] encodedObjectClasses,
                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> objectClassNames)
                           throws DirectoryException
        Persists the provided encoded object classes. The default implementation is to do nothing. Calls to this method are synchronized, so implementations can assume that this method is not being called by other threads. Note that this method is not thread-safe with respect to CompressedSchema.storeAttribute(byte[], String, Collection).
        Overrides:
        storeObjectClasses in class CompressedSchema
        Parameters:
        encodedObjectClasses - The encoded object classes.
        objectClassNames - The user provided set of object class names.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If an error occurred while persisting the encoded object classes.
